root.name: SimCity 3000 Unlimited
root.description: Another Sim City game in the long running series featuring an updated interface and improved graphics. Build your own city in predetermined scenarios or customize your own. Every aspect of the city is under the user's control including ordinances, infrastructure, zoning, police and fire departments, and providing sims with the educational and recreational tools they need to succeed.
